p: Twenty‐four (34.8%) patients received an allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplant: 18 aged ≥55 years and 6 aged <55 years. Twelve (17.4%) patients discontinued treatment in order to receive a transplant: 9 aged ≥55 years and 3 aged <55 years; 12 patients discontinued treatment for other reasons and later received a transplant. After censoring for transplant, median OS (80% CI) was 17.7 (14.5‐NE) months for all patients, 14.9 (13.4‐19.3) months in patients ≥55 years of age, and NE (NE‐NE) in patients <55 years of age (Figure 1).
